name: TobaccoUseCessationSessionTypeCPT
title: Tobacco Use Cessation Session Type (CPT)
description: Use grouped value set "Tobacco Use Cessation Session Type: "
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Types of tobacco use cessation sessions.),(Data Element Scope: Use to specify the type of a tobacco use cessation session observation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes used to specify types of tobacco use cessation sessions.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes not used to specify types of tobacco use cessation sessions.)

concept.display: Physician or other qualified health care professional qualified by education, training, licensure/regulation (when applicable) educational services rendered to patients in a group setting (eg, prenatal, obesity, or diabetic instructions)
Smoking and tobacco use cessation counseling visit; intermediate, greater than 3 minutes up to 10 minutes
Smoking and tobacco use cessation counseling visit; intensive, greater than 10 minutes
